description: Welcome to Wagner Valley Brewing Company, established in 1997. We are a small craft-brewing operation located in the Finger Lakes region of western New York. The brew system at Wagner's is an imported 20-BBL German-style, steam fired, four-vessel brew house, specifically designed for decoction mashing. Wagner Valley Brewing Company is unique by adhering to the Reinheitsgebot of 1516, a German Purity Law that states: "Only the finest Malt, Hops, Yeast and Water can be used in the production of beer". This quality standard, used for our standard beers, in conjunction with with our Brewers' talent has resulted in Wagner Valley Brewing continuously winning the most prestigious of brewing awards, capturing numerous G.A.B.F., World Beer Cup and Tap New York medals.

name: Geneva Lake Brewing Company
description: Local micro brewery in Lake Geneva Wi. Founded by father-son duo, Pat and Jon McIntosh, Geneva Lake Brewing Company are proud to be on tap at many locations! Check out our web page for the location closest to you!

name: Biltmore Brewing Company
description: When something is truly exceptional it earns your loyalty. That’s why we named our beer after George Vanderbilt’s beloved St. Bernard, Cedric. Family photographs capture moments of Cedric enjoying sunshine on the Loggia and sneaking in quiet naps in the library. Wherever George was, Cedric was sure to follow. That’s the kind of loyalty that inspires us to craft a quality beer—a beer worth your loyalty. In fact, we’d been thinking of creating a line of Biltmore beers bearing Cedric’s name for many years. Then, when the decision was made to open a tavern on the estate, aptly named Cedric’s Tavern, as part of the new Antler Hill Village, the opportunity presented itself to turn the idea of producing a line of beer into reality. That’s how Biltmore Brewing Company was established. Each beer in Cedric’s line is crafted to the exacting standards that George Vanderbilt appreciated and is made in the traditional English style. Craft beer enthusiast and newly appointed manager of Cedric’s Tavern, Bryan McIntosh has led the style selection of these new brews.

name: Base Camp Brewing Company
description: Base Camp Brewing Company is the result of brewmaster Justin Fay’s determined vision and years of hard work. His and brewer Paul Thurston’s combined decades of professional brewing experience are evident in each of Base Camp’s recipes. Each of our beers have been crafted with an eye toward innovation and creativity as well as consistency and balance, making for awesome brewskies that are at once approachable for any beer drinker and satisfying for the most adventure-minded palate.

name: Ipswich Ale Brewery
description: Always Fresh and Local Since 1991 Makers of Ipswich Ale, Stone Cat Ales & Lagers, and Mercury Soda Pop. Located in historic Ipswich, Massachusetts, one of America's oldest towns. Proudly brewed since 1991. What sets our Ales apart is our brewing process. We produce styles which are totally unfiltered and unpasteurized. Through this natural brewing style the result is ale which maintains a greater level of freshness, mouth feel, and full flavor.

name: Martin House Brewing Company
description: Martin House Brewing Company is a team of brewers, explorers, and dreamers. We avoid tradition in favor of adventure both in brewing and in life. We value good ingredients and good people. Each of our beers pairs perfectly with the memorable moments in life. We want to be your hand-crafted beer of choice that's there with you and your friends whether you're celebrating your most recent adventure or planning the next one. Martin House - Made in Texas by Texans."

name: Moylan's Brewing Company
description: Moylan’s Brewery & Restaurant, Novato’s only brewpub, was $3.5 million project that has established a strong following among North Marin’s beer connoisseurs. Moylan’s features a 57 foot long bar, a dart room with a fireplace and a reading library featuring brewing books and magazines from Brendan’s personal collection. By constructing the brewpub in an empty lot from his own vision, Moylan was able to increase efficiency and productivity, while still leaving room for expansion as the establishment’s popularity grows. According to Moylan, the location at Rowland Plaza provides good freeway visibility and helps attract a greater number of customers from the nearby theatre and corporate offices. When Moylan co-founded Marin Brewing Company back in 1989 there were only about a 100 brewpubs across the country. Today, there are more than 2000.

name: Long Ireland Beer Company
description: Long Ireland Beer Company began a little differently then most businesses. Two friends had a crazy idea to go out and start a business because they wanted to do something they truly enjoyed. DRINK BEER!

name: Lengthwise Brewing Co
description: Lengthwise Brewing Company was established in 1998 in order to follow the Great American Dream of turning passion into product. Initially, the creative partners divided their time between their "day jobs" and what is now regarded as Kern County's most popular micro-brewery. The production system includes a 14 Barrel Liquid Asset brewhouse and four 14 Barrel fermenters. Long hours and no pay almost never discouraged the inspired from taking a risk to pursue their heart's desire. Childhood friends, Jeff Williams and Darin Schwicker, are transplants from California's Central Coast. Forged by a friendship of competitive swimming and unsuccessful fishing, the two vowed to create a brewed product "true" to their Lengthwise philosophy. Jeff's worldwide experience of designing and setting up breweries in such remote locations as the Caribbean, Ukraine, Russia and Japan certainly contributed to his vision for developing a brewery.

name: Thirsty Dog Brewing Company
description: Here at the Thirsty Dog Brewing Company, full flavor, delicate balance, texture & aroma combine to make beer an infinitely complex experience, and one that can be thoroughly enjoyable. Each of our beers are meticulously hand crafted in small batches using the finest ingredients. High quality malted barley is the source of the beer's sweetness & body. Select American & European hops are used to balance the malt sweetness, and , at times, add special flavors & aromas to the beer. Our careful selection of ingredients, along with specially designed recipes & brewing processes, give Thirsty Dog beers their unique flavor profiles that can be hard to find in today's mass market. one size fits all society. Our microbrewed beers are far more diverse in range and character then the small spectrum of mass-marketed beers offered to the American public by the large national breweries. Enjoy the diversity, Unleash the flavor today., Welcome to Thirsty Dog Brewing Company, and welcome to great beer!

name: Saint Patrick's Brewing Company
description: World-class Artisan Lagers

name: Lucky Bucket Brewing Company
description: After years of working a local brewpub and experimenting in the garage, three guys decided to take their know-how and passion for great beer and bottle it. Lucky Bucket Brewing Company is Nebraska's newest craft brewery, growing almost as fast as we can brew it. Our first release, Pre-Prohibition style Lager, is getting some welcomed praise for representing the true character of beer, reminiscent of a time when beer actually had flavor. Keep an eye out for our latest releases including a very floral and flavorful American IPA and our first barrel-aged release, Certified Evil.

name: Willimantic Brewing Company
description: Our original Main Street Café was founded in 1991, and began operations as a small deli in the old Capitol Theatre building on Main Street in Willimantic, CT. Occupying both the lobby and concession area of the theatre, seating was limited to 50 people. After 3 years we were bursting at the seams and made the move to 877 Main Street, another historic building. There we expanded to a full service restaurant and featured American craft-brewed beers and an extensive menu.

name: Cervecería Calavera
description: En Cervecería Calavera cada cerveza es única, hecha para consentir y deleitar,diseñada para quien busca nuevas experiencias, sabores y texturas. Cervecería Calavera es un laboratorio de sabores donde exploramos nuevas dimensiones gustativas. En búsqueda de la perfección cervecera, muchas veces rompemos con los cánones establecidos, otras veces nos inclinamos hacia los más de 80 estilos tradicionales de cervezas, pero siempre trabajamos con las raíces solidamente plantadas en la calidad verdadera, tangible, simple y directa en todo lo que hacemos. En Cervecería Calavera todas nuestras cervezas son de autor, siendo éstas expresión del gusto personal del Maestro Cervecero, quien le da a todas sus recetas un toque personal, un estilo propio. Su autoría no se expresa en letras y obras de arte sino en sabores, aromas y texturas, diseñando experiencias gustativas que buscan despertar un recuerdo, una idea, un pensamiento. Cuide su Calavera, si maneja mejor tome malteza de Calavera.

name: Cerveceria Centro Americana S.A.
description: In 1886 the dream of two brothers who believed, trusted and invested in Guatemala, Don Mariano and Don Rafael Castillo Córdova, decided to begin the production of beer.

name: San Miguel Corporation
description: Established in 1890, La Fabrica de Cerveza de San Miguel, Southeast Asia's first brewery produced and bottled what would eventually become one of the bestselling beers in the region. Within the span of a generation, San Miguel Beer would become an icon among beer drinkers. By 1914, San Miguel Beer was being exported from its headquarters in Manila to Shanghai, Hong Kong and Guam. A pioneer in Asia, San Miguel established a brewery in Hong Kong in 1948, the first local brewer in the crown colony. Today, San Miguel Beer--the Company's flagship product--is one of the largest selling beers and among the top 10 beer brands in the world. While brewing beer is the company's heritage, San Miguel subsequently branched out into the food and packaging businesses.

name: Barnett & Son Brewing Co.
description: Barnett & Son Brewing Co. is a small craft brewery in Parker, Colorado. We make fine handcrafted ales, serving pints in the tasting room and filling growlers to go.

name: Spice Trade Brewing
description: Spice Trade Brewing (Formerly Yak and Yeti Brewpub) is located in Olde Town Arvada and resides in an 1864 haunted Victorian brick mansion. Our 7 barrel brewhouse can be seen from the lobby near the bar. All our beers are handcrafted by our brewmaster, Jeff Tyler. Seasonals beers are released monthly and sometimes weekly. Stop by for pint of craft beer or take home a growler today.

name: Beaver Brewing Company
description: We aren’t a microbrewery…we are an artisan NANO-brewery. Beaver Brewing Company has a 1.5 Barrel system that ensures that every beer is LITERALLY hand crafted. Every batch is tested before it is bottled to make sure you are getting the freshest and best tasting beer money can buy.

name: Seven Barrel Brewery
description: The 7Barrel was opened April 20, 1994 by renowned brewer Gregory J. Noonan. While Greg is no longer with us, his tradition lives on through the dedicated patrons that enjoy the unique, friendly atmosphere of a neighborhood pub and brewery. In continuing this tradition, the 7Barrel family welcomes you to visit us and celebrate our 20 years in the neighborhood. Under the ownership of Upper Valley locals since 2010, we here at the 7Barrel are focused on continuing to provide our customers with high quality fare, great craft beer, and the enjoyable and unique atmosphere people have come to expect from our establishment. Visit our website and like us on Facebook to stay in the know with all of latest news and event dates.

name: Wild Leap Brew Co.
description: Formed by friends and innovators, Wild Leap Brew Co. is dedicated to delighting customers with approachable, easy-drinking and handcrafted beverages in an atmosphere that’s always easy-going and enjoyable. You could say, when it comes to beer, we’re raising the bar.

name: Twisted Manzanita Ales
description: Twisted Manzanita Ales craft brewery specializing in beers brewed with passion and creativity. We are a proud member of the craft beer industry, and work to maintain a standard of craft beer companies.

name: Maplewood Brewing Company
description: Illinois' first craft brewery & distillery under a single roof.

name: Copper Kettle Brewing Company
description: Copper Kettle Brewing Company is a locally owned Mom and Pop brewery, established in 2011. Built on the foundation of craft beer, quality ingredients and the idea of re-creating the local neighborhood pub feel that America seems to have lost. Come on in and enjoy a pint or two and take a growler home with you to share with your friends and family

name: Lock 27 Brewing
description: Our Mission. Craft. This single word means a great deal to us at Lock 27 Brewing. We use it daily to guide us in producing only the best for our customers. To us, it's more than just a label. It's about the quality of the ingredients and the care we take to prepare them. It's about the creative thought process. It's about seeing rules as suggestions. Whether it's our in house premium craft beers, or the fresh dishes prepared in our eclectic kitchen, we strive to provide everyone we encounter with a true craft experience.

name: Ventura Coast
description: Ventura Coast Brewing Company is a small craft brewery and tasting room located in downtown Ventura, opened in October 2016.

name: Kinney Creek Brewery
description: Kinney Creek Brewery started out as a love for beer, and a lack of quality brewed, right priced beer. After making home brew for a small test group, things got bigger and bigger. Now we are making several varieties of beer to accommodate the need for great Midwest Brewed beer. We source as many of our ingredients that we can from our local neighbors to bring you the very freshest and eco-friendly beer on the market., Currently we are expanding our facility, increasing our advertising, expanding our exposure to local bars & restaurants, and introducing our product to new customers. So please watch for us in your neighborhood.

name: Preyer Brewing Company
description: A microbrewery born and raised in Greensboro, NC.

name: Colorado Cider Company
description: The Colorado Cider Company was founded to produce a fresh hard cider for the discerning Colorado drinker. With a well-developed craft beer market and an educated populace Hard Cider has been a missing choice in the cacophony of craft drinks in local pubs and liquor stores. We hope to remedy that. We're getting out in the market, check out our "Find us" page!

name: Alewerks Brewing Company
description: AleWerks Brewing Company is located in the heart of the early colonies in Williamsburg, Virginia. Established in 2006 we have rolled out a broad range of beer offerings and quickly established a reputation for fine beer. We operate a direct fired brick-clad Peter Austin brew house and ferment all our beers in state-of-the-art conical fermentors.

name: Chetco Brewing Company
description: Small Town Brewing, World Class Beer. This Award winning nano-brewery on the Southern Oregon Coast brews an amazing array of finely crafted Ales. From their Unite Pink Pale Session Ale to their Silver Medal* winning Block & Tackle American Imperial Stout, Chetco brews every batch with great affection and respect for the craft. *2014 World Beer Cup Silver Award winner, Block & Tackle American Style, Imperial Stout

name: Baderbräu
description: Chicago's Original Craft Beer

name: Broken Compass Brewing
description: Broken Compass Brewery is the newest Brewery in Breckenridge Colorado. Come get lost with us and find great beers all around you. Its founders Jason Ford and David Axelrod are committed to to bringing quality beers to a quality town.

name: Pagosa Brewing & Grill
description: Pagosa Brewing Company™ & Grill is Pagosa Springs' Award-Winning Brewery, recommended by Sunset Magazine, National Geographic & The New York Times. We feature Local, Regional & Wild-Caught Pub Fare available in our dining room as well as 10,000 square feet of tree-covered Beer Garden with festival tent, full sized-stage, professional lighting & sound system. Hope you can join us!

name: Yukon Brewing
description: Yukon Brewing opened its doors in 1997 under the name Chilkoot Brewing Co. Ltd. Owners Alan and Bob conceived their idea like many Yukon babies – around a campfire on a canoe trip. Both Ontario natives, they’ve lived and worked in the Territory for a good deal of their adult lives. From that inaugural conversation grew plans for a craft brewery that would service the north with quality beer while keeping jobs and money in the territory. Over a decade later Yukon Brewing, as it is called today, continues to work towards that goal. Employing a dozen or so staff (more in the busy summer months), Yukon Brewing actively supports countless Yukon events and causes each year. Bob and Alan continue as owners and chief operators, growing the company outside the Yukon. The breweries 8 packaged beers are available across Alberta and BC with some even finding their way as far east as Quebec and at the Hannover Zoo in Germany.

name: Bières de Chimay
description: The Chimay Brewery is a Belgian brewery founded inside Scourmont Abbey, in the Belgian municipality of Chimay in 1862. The brewery produces three widely distributed ales and a patersbier exclusively for the monks; they are known as Trappist beers because they are made in a Trappist monastery. The brewing plant was updated in 1988, and as of 2005 produced 120,000 hectolitres annually. Since 1876 the monastery has also made cheese, and currently offers four cheeses.

name: Passarola Brewing
description: Client brewer from Portugal.

name: Lawson's Finest Liquids
description: Lawson’s Finest Liquids, LLC is based in Warren, Vermont and distributes small, custom batches of unique beer through their exclusive wholesale distributor, The Beer Guy, LLC. Sean Lawson, founder and brewer, has been an avid home brewer for nearly twenty years, with numerous award winning recipes. Lawson’s Finest, with a small batch system, can custom craft specialty beers for establishments and events. Limited in availability by design, these rare beers can only be found near the Mad River Valley of Vermont.

name: Town in City Brewing Company
description: We love our neighborhood. We love how eclectic, unique, and quaint the Heights is. So what better way to honor our home than to name our brewery after it. The heights is known as the Small Town In The Big City. So we decided to name our brewery Town In City Brewing Company in honor of Houston's first official suburb that was established way back in 1896.

name: Insight Brewing
description: The inspiration to start Insight Brewing Company happened in Denmark in 2007 when I tasted the world’s best beer on ratebeer.com. It was a Westvleteren 12, a beer brewed by Belgian Monks. I had no idea that beer could have such complex flavors. The experience instantly changed my life and set me off on an adventure around the world in pursuit of deeper insight into global brewing cultures and techniques. In 2010 and 2011, I worked with breweries in England, Japan and Denmark, picked hops in West Kent, and befriended brewers from around the globe. The experiences and trade secrets I picked up inspired me to start a brewery where I could bring new and innovative beers back home to the U.S. Together with my partners Brian Berge, Kevin Hilliard, and Eric Schmidt, we’ve made that dream come true with Insight Brewing Company.

name: Snowy Mountain Brewery
description: The Snowy Mountain Brewery is located in beautiful Saratoga, Wyoming and is the anchor brewpub for the Saratoga Resort and Spa. The Saratoga Resort and Spa consistently draws people from all over Colorado and Wyoming due to its unique offering of a variety of amenities in one location--such as an on-site brewery, mineral hot spring pools, great food, western-styled rooms, jeep, ATV and snowmobile rentals, a golf course and a full-service spa. The Snowy Mountain Brewery is gaining in exposure and was featured recently in Travel Pulse’s “5 Unique Beer Vacation Spots in the U.S.!” The name Snowy Mountain is fitting for the brewery as it sits adjacent the majestic Snowy Range Mountains, in southern Wyoming. Boasting 8-10 different craft beers throughout each season, the Snowy Mountain Brewery is one of the fastest growing breweries in Wyoming and surrounding states. The famous brewpub, with a throw-back to the wild west, is adorned with big game mounts and bar-stools made with six-shooters and patinated saddles and features a full pub menu with selections that compliment Saratoga's finest craft beers.

name: Trout River Brewing
description: Trout River Brewing was founded in July 1996 by Dan and Laura Gates. We began brewing in early December of that year. We still own and operate this microbrewery in the northeastern region of Vermont--The Northeast Kingdom! Come visit this special and beautiful place and taste all that the Kingdom has to offer. Trout River Brewing prides itself on creating and serving fresh, all natural, premium ales and lagers. Our beers are made with pure Vermont water, the best imported and domestic malts and hops, and quality yeasts. Nothing else is added and we take nothing away!

name: Evans Brewing Company
description: Evans Brewing Company is a full scale brewing company located in Irvine, California. As Orange County’s oldest craft brewery and one of the largest, Evans Brewing Co. brews all of the Bayhawk Ales brands and is in the process of re-branding these beers under the Evans Brewing Company name. After a 2 year hiatus, the Silver Medal World Beer Cup award winning Evans Lagers will also be making a return to the market. These beers will be brewed at the Irvine brewery by Summer 2015. Follow EBC on Instagram @evansbrewingco

name: Miner Brewing Company
description: Located in the heart of the Black Hills, and owned and operated by the same family behind the award-winning Prairie Berry Winery, Miner Brewing Company produces craft beers that are both traditional in nature, and yet truly “South Dakota”. With five generations of family lineage handcrafting beverages in South Dakota, and with 15 years as winemaker and owner of Prairie Berry Winery, Brewmaster Sandi Vojta is inspired by the traditional brewing styles of her family’s European heritage. By infusing regional and seasonal ingredients into the recipes handed down to her, she has skillfully adapted those traditional styles to create craft beers with a regional character, setting each distinctly apart from other microbrews. All of our beers are produced in small, 15-barrel fermenters, allowing us to keep each batch small enough to maintain microbrew quality and a close attention to detail at all times. The results are craft beers that are approachable and distinctive, to be enjoyed by craft beer novices and enthusiasts alike. We invite you to experience Miner Brewing for yourself, as we open our Tap Room in Hill City this fall 2013. Stop on by for a flight or a glass, hang out to enjoy our seasonal selections, and stay a while for a little South Dakota hospitality. Join us in the Black Hills and discover your own pint of gold.

name: Jackie O's Pub and Brewery
description: Jackie O's Pub and Brewery prides itself in creating neo-traditional handcrafted artisan ales. Inside each pint, a fusion of American craft brewing creativity and historically sound techniques await your palate. A marriage of exploration and tradition guaranteed to cure whatever ales you!

name: Doppelleu Brewery
description: Welcome to our brewery! Since January 2013, we brew some of the most tasty beers in Switzerland in Winterthur. Convince yourself!

name: Rip Current Brewing
description: We believe Rip Current is the right name for our brewery as it reflects our vision for the brewery being a strong force that goes against the conventional beer style flow so as to change the entire beer landscape. We plan to brew uncompromising, assertive flavored ales and lagers bringing maximum variety to the southern California beer community. At Rip Current Brewing, we plan to listen closely our customer’s preferences and use this to drive the wide variety of beer available at our tasting room and keg accounts. We will challenge drinkers’ pallets to enjoy new flavor experiences while not losing sight of what beers people demand on an ongoing basis. Our tap room will feature a rotating selection of seasonal and experimental styles complementing San Diego favorites like the IPA, Imperial IPA and hoppy amber. Rip Current will lever our extensive recipe library of award winning beers to maximize our customer’s enjoyment.

name: Evil Czech Brewery
description: Evil Czech has been operating since 2011 and opened it's doors to a new 20 barrel facility in 2014. ... sometimes for beer to be good, it has to get evil.

name: Denali Brewing Company
description: Denali Brewing Company is Talkeetna, Alaska's local craft brewery. In addition to serving the community of Talkeetna through our tasting room and sister establishment, Twister Creek Restaurant, our beers are on tap at an increasing number of killer bars and restaurants in and around the Mat-Su Valley and Anchorage, Alaska. At Denali Brewing Company we use only the finest ingredients to handcraft the kinds of honest beers you like to drink.

name: Biker Brewhouse, LLC
description: We are a Microbrewery located inside Biketown Harley Davidson in Youngstown Ohiio

name: Neshaminy Creek Brewing Company
description: Located in Lower Bucks County, Pennsylvania, Neshaminy Creek Brewing is one of the fastest growing craft breweries in the Philadelphia area. Since opening in June of 2012 the brewery has built a solid reputation for solid lagers and hoppy ales. Winner of the 2015 Philly Beer Scene magazine Brewery of the Year and 2014 and 2015 Brewer of the Year, Neshaminy Creek has also won a GABF Gold Medal in 2013 for their Vienna-style Churchville Lager. To make great tasting beer that challenges not only beer drinkers, but ourselves as brewers as well.

name: Danville Brewing Company
description: The Maita family has been in the beer business since shortly after prohibition; distributing and working with some of the best breweries in the world. When a great spot became available in historic downtown Danville we thought, perfect location for a brewery! So the process began. In order to make this place extra spectacular, the Maitas partnered with general and managing partner of local favorites Bridges and the Vine, Randy Negi. We knew this alliance would ensure we compliment great craft beer with incredible food. Put our passions together, and a fun spot called Danville Brewing Co. is born. Our head brewer, Matt Sager is a UC Davis Master Brewers program graduate and has been an award winning brewer for 20 years. Matt has engineered some worthy brews and he’s always eager to “talk shop”, so when you see him on site or any of us around, feel free to say hi. We look forward to welcoming all of our friends, family, and new friends to be made to the locally owned and operated DBC. Cheers!!

name: Del Norte Brewing Company
description: Del Norte is the only U.S. brewer specializing in authentic Mexican-style beers. Brewed locally in small batches with traditional ingredients, our beers capture the styles and flavor of the oldest brewing heritage in the Western Hemisphere.

name: The Brew on Broadway
description: Craft Brewery and Coffee House with a great south faced Brew Garden that is Dog friendly

name: Big Top Brewing Company
description: Big Top Brewing Company is a Sarasota based production brewery. Proudly distributed by Coastal Beverage, Gold Coast Eagle Distributing, Great Bay Distributing, and Pepin Distributing Company. Having lived here all our lives we know the history behind our beautiful town. Typically seen as a tourist destination for beaches, weather and art, Big Top plans to add world renown beer manufacture to those well deserved titles. We look forward to crafting the best beer, in the best town and showcasing it with the best artwork designed by Ringling School of Art and Design graduates.

name: 450 North Brewing Company
description: Owners David and Brenda Simmons had a plan to expand their winery business with a restaurant. Several of the wine customers are also beer drinkers. What better way to satisfy all customers than to offer fresh locally produced beer. Opening in Sept. of 2012, 450 North Brewing Company will open as a Brewpub with a full service restaurant.

name: Bombshell Beer Company
description: Bombshell Beer Company’s 5,840 sq. ft building is conveniently located in the heart of Holly Springs within the Omni business park located off N.Main St. The building will house the production brewery, lab and a 1400 sq. ft. tasting room. Our brewery features a custom designed 15 BBL steam fired brewhouse manufactured by SMT Food and Beverage Systems of Stokesdale NC. Our equipment is crafted by US workers and made of US stainless steel, a key factor of why we selected SMT as our equipment manufacturer. Supporting American workers and American Industry was important to the Bombshell founders. Bombshell’s brewhouse features a two vessel system consisting of a mash tun complete with rakes and steam jacket for step infusion mashing and a combination brew kettle/whirlpool. A thirty barrel hot liquor tank and dual stage high efficiency plate and frame heat exchanger round out Bombshell’s brewhouse system. Initially two 15BBL and one 30BBL multi zone jacketed fermentation vessels and a 30BBL bright tank will be utilized in the production of Bombshell’s high quality, craft beers. We will showcase our hand-crafted beers to the public in a new 1400 sq. ft. tasting room scheduled opening is which is planned to be open to visitors in July. The tasting room will offer sample flights, pints, and beer to go in growlers and kegs. Brewery tours and private event programs will also be available. Bombshell Beer is owned by Ellen Joyner, Michelle Miniutti and Jackie Hudspeth.

name: Gift Horse Brewing Company
description: "Purveyors of finely crafted libations" Soon everyone will be able to "Stick a Gift Horse in their mouth"

name: ZümBier
description: ZümBier translates to destination beer. We promote the beer experience. We brew 'to style' beers from Germany and innovation beer that truely wonderful. The best of both the old and new worlds. Craft beer today is more than an adult beverage, It's an experience! We say 'life is a great adventure - drink it!'

name: Big Rock Urban Brewery
description: A new addition to Vancouver’s thriving craft beer scene, located in the heart of the Brewery Creek/Mount Pleasant district. Our full scale brewery offers brewery tours and tastings, a beer store with growler fill bar, and also features a full service restaurant & lounge serving beer-inspired dishes with live & local music many nights a week.

name: Oak Pond Brewing Co.
description: Outstanding Brewery located within 30 mins from Colby College in rural Maine. Phenomenal Nut Brown Ale, among others.

name: OpenRoad Brewery
description: The open road can be comforting or adventurous, well traveled or off the beaten path. It can take you places you have never been and return you home again. At the Open Road Brewery our beers are crafted with these principles in mind. So, hit the OpenRoad Brewery in Downtown Wayland where you will feel the comfort of home and the adventure of the open road in every drink.

name: Maisel & Friends
description: Maisel & Friends is one of the principal pioneers of the German craft beer market and also internationally recognized. We have a large part in that beer has again the importance that it deserves. The Maisel & Friends beers are an integral part in the craft beer shelf and the well-stocked beer card.

name: Funk Brewing Company
description: Avant-Garde brewers dedicated to the innovation of hop accentuated ales and the revival of rustic farmhouse style beer.

name: Seattle Cider Company
description: Seattle Cider Company is Seattle’s first cidery since Prohibition, bringing true craft cider back to Seattle and across the country. Bridging the gap between wine and beer with flavorful, small-batch cider, Seattle Cider’s initial offerings – Dry and Semi-Sweet – break the mold of overly sweet cider, bringing the natural flavors of Washington apples to the forefront.

name: Brenner Brewing Co.
description: Brenner Brewing Co. is a microbrewery in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. Founder, Mike Brenner was awarded the title Master Brewer after completing a rigorous international training program at the Siebel Institute and the Doemens Akademie. Every aspect of the brewery includes the founders lifelong commitment to supporting local art and music. Brenner's passion for crafting delicious beer and his lifelong devotion to Milwaukee's arts and music scene, has led to the creation of Brenner Brewing's "12 Ounce Ambassadors." Each style of beer features the artwork of a local artist and comes with a soundtrack featuring the music of local bands. As Brenner Brewing's distribution expands so does the awareness of Milwaukee's incredible arts scene. Brenner also opened a 25,000 sq ft arts incubator in the building with the brewery which features a 2,000 sq ft contemporary art gallery and 20 artists' studio spaces. Come visit the brewery, tasting room, and art gallery soon.

name: Fort Myers Brewing Company
description: Lee County's first microbrewery. Award winning craft ales brewed 7 barrels at a time.

name: Woodland Empire Ale Craft
description: Imaginative brew creations concocted by husband and wife team Rob and Keely Landerman, Dusty Schmidt, and Tom Dolan. Handcrafted. Imaginative. Idahoan.

name: New Province Brewing Co.
description: At New Province, brewing isn't simply a craft, it's an obsession. We embody the belief that brewing is a delicate blend of art and science. Each drop has been meticulously crafted, without compromise, resulting in a quality pint every time. Here the process is as important as the pour, and there's always something new to discover. Here we're passionate about changing the way you experience beer. Within our borders you are one of us, and the craft is yours to claim.

name: Odyssey Beerwerks
description: Back when the world was a much different place, filled with grunge music, loose fitting clothes, and Wayne’s World movies, two shady characters fell in together and started doing various sketch and wonderful things. One of these was brewing . . . beer. Not the tasty, modern, complex craft beers flowing in today’s market, but the goofy and “just OK” beers that home brewers in the 90’s seemed to know how to build. These guys (we’ll call them Chris and Josh for lack of anonymity’s sake) got better at brewing over the years, even as they moved apart. Chris went down a corporate marketing path; Josh seemed to prefer engineering and operations; both still enjoyed beer and, with lots of practice, the homebrew got better and better. When Y2K sputtered out before it even came to life, the two had their first discussion about opening a brewery. More life happened. More of the guys’ improving craft beers were served at more home parties. When they got together again more recently, the topic resurfaced, but this time it wouldn’t go away. And gradually a brewery was born. 20 years since the start of their homebrew hobbies, Odyssey Beerwerks was formed to do the impossible: take an enjoyable hobby of creating fine craft beers and make it into a dreary job, with the benefit of bringing new and exciting hand crafted beers onto our vibrant planet.

name: Kern River Brewing Company
description: The Kern River Brewing Company (KRBC) brings people back to the magnificent simplicities that life has to offer. From its beginnings, Kernville has been a wild-west town. Established as a mining settlement in the mid 1800's and continuing as a ranching community through the 1900's, Kernville remains a town of adventure, offering a wide variety of outdoor activities. On any given day, the outdoor enthusiast enjoys activities ranging from the excitement of whitewater rafting, kayaking, downhill skiing, cross-country skiing, snowmobiling, horseback riding, attending rodeos, windsurfing, water-skiing, mountain biking and climbing. If a more relaxing day is preferred, people can enjoy fishing, hiking, camping, sailing, antiquing, and bird watching or simply kicking back and taking in the spectacular views of the Sierra Nevada mountain range.

name: Lake of Bays Brewing Company
description: The Lake of Bays Brewing Company is Northern Ontario's newest craft brewery. We busted our butts for more than a year getting ready to launch, and now our retail store and brewery in Baysville is open for business (woohoo!). Try our beer and see what Pure Northern Taste is all about. Cheers!

name: Pedernales Brewing Company
description: Pedernales Brewing Company is proud to announce their highly anticipated opening in the city of Fredericksburg, Texas. Texas Hill Country's newest microbrewery will feature Classic and German-style beers. PBC’s impressive lineup of beers will include skillfully crafted lagers and ales. At this time we are offering our flagship brands; LOBO and LOBO Negro. “LOBO” is the name of the WOLF native to Texas and the Southwest. Sadly, the wolf was almost wiped out by big ranchers some 100 years ago; not unlike the small craft brewers who were similarly annihilated by prohibition.

name: Full Sail Brewing Company
description: Perched on a bluff in Hood River, Oregon, overlooking the mighty Columbia River’s epic wind and kite surfing and the snow-capped volcanic peaks of Mt. Hood, Full Sail is a true craft-brewing pioneer. Since 1987, Full Sail has been pouring pure Mt. Hood water, local ingredients and responsible processes into each and every pint. Full Sail’s brews and sustainable practices have garnered more than 300 national and international awards, including 150 gold medals and Beverage World‘s “Craft Brewer of the Year” distinction. From Full Sail Amber and IPA to Session Lager and bourbon barrel-aged beers, Full Sail consistently strives to brew complex, balanced and ridiculously tasty beers.

name: Bee Creek Brewery
description: Bee Creek Brewery is a family business that nestles comfortably in an old growth forest of immense Maples, bush tangles, and surrounding thickets in Clay County, Indiana. Established on May 7th 2007 by Dr. Frank Forster, wife Julie, and Julie's big brother, Mark Snelling, the brewery was christened Bee Creek for the stream cutting through the center of the property. The Forster's are dynamic owners. Not satisfied to manage from the front office, Julie and Dr. Frank are hands-on, day-to-day problem solvers. Then there is Bee Creek's signature ales; a product of Brewmaster Mark Snelling's accomplished recipes of hops, honey, wheat, yeast and magical elements. A navy veteran, he commands over 25 years brewing experience.

name: Great Divide Brewing Company
description: These beers have landed an impressive amount of acclaim: Great Divide beers have earned 18 Great American Beer Festival medals and 5 World Beer Cup awards. Great Divide was also ranked 8th in Ratebeer.com’s 2010 “The Best Brewers in the World” and was ranked 7th in Beer Advocate’s 2009 “All-Time Top Breweries on Planet Earth.” But why take their word for it? Crack open a bottle and decide for yourself.

name: Golden City Brewery
description: Golden City Brewery was founded in 1993 by two geologists, Charlie & Janine Sturdavant. They filled the old machine shop behind their historic Golden home with used dairy tanks and Charlie began brewing German-style ales. The tasting room was originally located in the sunroom of their house and provided Red Ale and Pale Ale to the local community in half-gallon growlers and kegs. Since that time, the operation has expanded at the same location (still their home). The carriage house has become the the tasting room, the backyard is the beer garden. The brewery is still in the machine shop, but a second level was added inside. All of the old equipment has been replaced with real beer fermenters and a slightly used gas-fired kettle. The brewery produces those now legendary Red & Pale Ales, in addition to a few other brews.

name: Pariah Brewing Company
description: We are fanatical and quite probably even Zealot’s when it comes to doing it our way. Our way is innovation. Our way is to the enrichment of all, not the few. Our way is to never, ever, settle. Our way is not "square" and it is not easy and may even initially offend many. This is why we proudly wear the signification of Pariah. That’s who we are. We do it differently. In a world of “Hey, me too!” and downright piggy backing we proudly will stand outside of social comforts, because we’re honest with ourselves and therefore honest to you just the same. If you're looking for something different, progressive, challenging and rewarding then our products are for you, our fellow pariah’s.

name: Olde Main Brewing Co.
description: At Olde Main Brewing Co. we believe, it's not about the next beer, it's about enjoying the one in your hand. That's why head brewer Jeff "Puff" Irvin and brewer "Big John" Rundall blend traditional brewing practices and modern techniques to craft fresh, full-flavored beers. Taste the true deliciosity at bars, restaurant, and retail stores across Iowa or at the Ames brewery and restaurant.

name: Stormbreaker Brewing
description: Look for our beers across town starting in January. Come have a beer with us at our location in February!

name: Bang Brewing
description: Goodness is brewing…

name: Cocoa Beach Brewing Company
description: Cocoa Beach Brewing Company is a family owned and operated brewery and pub. We are located in historic downtown Cocoa Beach on Atlantic Avenue (northbound Highway A1A) between 1st Street North and 2nd Street North. We are proud to be located in one of the oldest buildings in world famous Cocoa Beach. Built in the 1930s, our building was originally Navy housing for the Banana River Naval Air Station. It has since been home to a number of commercial enterprises. Our brewery consists of a custom designed and built 1.5 bbl Brewhouse and three 1.5 bbl stainless steel conical fermentation tanks.

name: Bavaria
description: Fundada en abril de 1889 CervecerÃ?Âa Ã?Âguila tiene una capacidad de producciÃ?Â³n de 3.234.000 hectolitros de cerveza al aÃ?Â±o, con los cuales atiende los departamentos del Sucre, Magdalena, AtlÃ?Â¡ntico, BolÃ?Âvar, Guajira, Cesar y la Isla de San AndrÃ?Â©s. Produce y distribuye las marcas Ã?Âguila, Club Colombia, CosteÃ?Â±ita, ademÃ?Â¡s de cerveza en barril; Agua Brisa en diferentes presentaciones y Pony Malta. Esta planta tiene su origen en la CervecerÃ?Âa Barranquilla que empieza operaciones el 10 de abril de 1913 y aÃ?Â±os mÃ?Â¡s tarde, en 1933, se une a la CervecerÃ?Âa BolÃ?Âvar, convirtiÃ?Â©ndose en la CervecerÃ?Âa Barranquilla y BolÃ?Âvar S.A. El 3 de marzo de 1967 la compaÃ?Â±Ã?Âa tomÃ?Â³ el nombre de CervecerÃ?Âa Ã?Âguila S.A. En diciembre de 2002 se fusionÃ?Â³ con Bavaria S.A. convirtiÃ?Â©ndose en una planta estratÃ?Â©gica para el proceso de exportaciones de la compaÃ?Â±Ã?Âa. Desde octubre de 2005, Bavaria es parte de SABMiller, segunda cervecera mundial en volumen, con operaciones en cuatro continentes y una producciÃ?Â³n que supera los 170 millones de hectolitros de cerveza anuales en mÃ?Â¡s de 170 marcas.

name: CMG Brewery
description: Carmel Indiana's downtown brewpub.

name: Junkyard Brewing Company
description: Junkyard Brewing Company was conceived as I brewed my first batch of homebrew in college. I still remember that batch; it was a five-gallon recipe with eight pounds of dark malt extract powder and eight ounces of chinook hops for the boil with a packet of dry yeast to ferment it. I "bottled" this first batch in pint-sized canning jars and judged when the natural carbonation had taken place by the "plink, plink" noises of the lids buckling upward under pressure. Friends suggested names for my first brew, and a couple stand out in my mind: "Junk's Trunk" and "Junkyard" beer. It was nicknames like these that helped guide me toward choosing the name "Junkyard" for our brewing company when the time came to attach a name to my idea.

name: Front Range Brewing Company
description: Come visit Lafayette's first craft brewery. Independently owned and locally operated come by to "Expand your Range" with a variety of American, German, and Belgian style beers, including barrel aged, specialty, and kettle sour offerings. Stop by our tasting room to enjoy a pint then fill up a growler or take home a bomber to enjoy at home. Order tasty lunch or dinner options from our restaurant with table side service.

name: Odd13 Brewing
description: Odd13 is a brewery located at 301 East Simpson Street in old-town Lafayette, Colorado. Our focus is flavorful American-style hoppy beers, Belgian styles, and sour beers.

name: Heater Allen Brewery
description: We are a small artisan brewery located in McMinnville, Oregon. We specialize in producing distinctive all-malt lager and other German and Czech style beers. We use only the finest, most appropriate malts, hops, water and yeast in our beers. While our lagers are similar to those made in Germany, they are our own unique interpretation of the style. Lager beers are fermented at lower temperatures than ale, using yeast that has adapted to cooler fermentations. Low temperature fermentations create fewer “yeasty” aromas, esters, and flavors that are so common in ales. We brew lagers because we enjoy their smooth malty and hoppy character.

name: Yachats Brewing
description: Yachats Brewing creates high quality beers celebrating the unique beauty and culture of Yachats, OR

name: Coastal Empire Beer Company
description: Artisan ales and lagers.

name: Front Street Brewery
description: Located in Historic Downtown, the Front Street Brewery is Wilmington’s only Restaurant with its own Brewery. Our staff takes pride in offering fresh modern American cuisine, ranging from gourmet burgers to fine entrees and everything in between, at a reasonable price. Front Street Brewery focuses on traditional beers as well as stretching the limits from time to time with various oak aged beers, sours and experimental styles throughout the year.

name: NoDa Brewing Company
description: NoDa Brewing Company opened its doors to the world on October 29, 2011 and is one of Charlotte’s newest home-grown microbrewery for beer lovers in the Carolinas! This unique production brewery in Charlotte’s NoDa neighborhood crafts small-batch premium beers, offering something for nearly every beer drinker. The North Davidson (NoDa) neighborhood is known as the creative center of Charlotte: as a natural extension of NoDa’s artistic spirit, there isn’t a better place for a microbrewery to call home. NoDa Brewing is a 15 barrel brewery creating the highest quality beers for local restaurants and pubs, as well as our tap room. Our beer styles will have a Northwestern feel, showcasing American Pale Ales, India Pale Ales, and Porters. Our small size gives us the flexibility to introduce many unique and artistic recipes as well as our renditions of classic varieties such as Imperial Stouts, Wit beers, and Winter Warmers. Our Head Brewer frequently traveled to Europe over the past couple years. He has been fortunate to have experienced the wonderful beers that have historically defined many current craft beer styles. As we pay homage to these great and historic beers, we’ll add an American Flair that will be embraced in the Carolinas and beyond.

name: Roosterfish Brewing Co.
description: Roosterfish Brewing’s history begins in 1990 when the Wildflower Café was founded by owner Doug Thayer. A microbrewery was in the original plans for the business but was not feasible at the time due to the high cost of equipment and space. The Wildflower Café had enormous success, which helped the inspiration for the Crooked Rooster Brewpub’s opening in 1998, again founded by Doug Thayer. Throughout the running of these side-by-side businesses, Doug always had brewing on his mind and began to experiment in 2002 with home brewing. Receiving excellent feedback on his brews from several beer aficionados, Roosterfish Brewing’s first official beer, Black Walnut Nut Brown Ale (now known as Original Nut Brown Ale) was unveiled at the Crooked Rooster and Wildflower Café in 2004. This was shortly followed with the Butternut Pale Ale, now known as Dog Tooth Pale Ale. The drastic name changes occurred because the originals were rejected due to “implied ingredients” that weren’t actually present in the beers.

name: Two Kilts Brewing Co
description: Two Kilts Brewing Co. was founded in 2009 by owners and brewers Chris Dillon, and Alex McGaw. Fueled by a passion for all things craft beer they opened a modest 6 barrel brewery and in 2 short years have expanded to their current 15 barrel brewery. They specialize in hand crafting fine American Ales and Lagers, brewed with hints of European influence.

name: Proof Brewing Co
description: Proof opened its Tennessee Street location in 2007- it currently houses our Retail Store, Modern American Pub, Pilot Brewery, Brew Lab and Tasting Rooms. Our Pilot Brewery is cranking out experimental & unique styles weekly that are only available on site and our tap list is ever changing. Proof Brewing Co. is where you can enjoy two tasting rooms featuring 50 taps of the best Craft Brews available, over 200 Top Rated beers in the bottle and growlers of all 50 taps are available to go. PBC features an immense selection of Premium Liquor, Small Batch Bourbon, Vintage Whiskeys and Handcrafted Cocktails . Our retail store, Proof Bottle Shop, has the largest selection of Craft, Import Beer and Mead in North Florida as well as handpicked Specialty Liquors & Boutique Wines.

name: Papago Brewing Company
description: Papago Brewing Company is located in Scottsdale, Arizona on the southwest corner of Scottsdale and McDowell Rd. We have 30 rotating taps and about 500 different bottled beers. Proud to be locally owned and operated since May 2001.

name: Cheluna Brewing
description: Cheluna Brewing was founded in 2014. We are pleased to announce that in 2016 we will open a production brewery and public taproom at Stanley Marketplace in Aurora, Colorado.

name: Old Firehouse Brewery
description: The dream all began a few years ago while microbrewery hopping in Asheville, North Carolina. The Wife and I were sitting at dinner enjoying some fabulous craft beer and when she made the ultimate statement to me: "You know, for as much as you love craft beer, you should make it for a living." Thus the mission of the Old Firehouse Brewery was found: To passionately brew fresh, hand-crafted beer by using only the finest ingredients possible. Our motto is great beer, great friends and great fun.

name: Coedo Brewery
description: Representing Japan’s globally appealing craft beer, COEDO makes premium craft beers in Japan, whose brewing and high quality has received accolades from the world.

name: Smog City Brewing
description: Smog City Brewing is a Los Angeles based brewery devoted to putting its mark on the craft beer scene with exceptionally balanced and creatively inspired beers.

name: Westport Brewing Company
description: Westport Brewing Company is the first microbrewery on the Washington Coast since 1944 when Pacific Brewing Company closed its doors. Emulating traditional brewing conditions, we brew our beer with local water without amendments, regionally grown hops, and domestic malts. We take advantage of our unique location, on a peninsula between the Pacific Ocean and Grays Harbor, to ferment our beer in polyethylene fermenters at ambient temperatures. This results in smooth, clear, unhurried beer with sparkling clarity, deep, complex flavor profiles, and remarkable consistency between styles. We currently brew 19 styles of beer and are always exploring new recipes to appeal to the craft-wise thirsty palates of the region. We currently brew in a 3-Barrel brewhouse but have plans to expand in the near future. Our brewery welcomes visitors Thursday through Monday, noon to 6PM, each week to sample our wide variety of beer, visit with Mark and Robin and enjoy the beauty of Westport and the Washington Coast!

name: Three Huskies Brewing
description: A 3 barrel microbrewery in Upstate NY inside of Dobber's Sports Bar and Grill LLC.

name: Empirical Brewery
description: Empirical Brewery is a startup brewery in Chicago Illinois. Our mission is to create high quality craft beers that exceed your expectations. We are focused on innovation and exploration of unique flavor profiles. Our customers come first and have a direct impact on brewery operations. The advantage of a craft brewery is that it can respond to changing market tastes. To that end, we will endeavor to gather feedback from you and incorporate it into our brewing. For updates on the brewery, follow us on Twitter, Facebook or our blog. Look for our beer to be available early next year.

name: Mountain State Brewing Company
description: As Natives of West Virginia, it has long been our dream to bring quality hand-crafted beer back to our state. Originally from Elkins and Helvetia, we were raised on easy drinking beers and homemade wine. Curiosity eventually got the best of us, and we combined the two - our first batch of homebrew was conceived in the early 90's with home brewing equipment, books, and some ingredients handed down from our parent's home brewing days in the 70's. Since then we've learned a lot about brewing professionally. We developed easy drinking and well rounded beers with our own state of the art brewing equipment. We sold our first beer in October 2005 and now we're distributing throughout the Canaan Valley, Davis, Thomas, Elkins, Morgantown and Fayetteville. That's our story so far. Thank you for all the great support we've received pursuing our dream. - Brian & Willie

name: Half Moon Restaurant & Brewery
description: At the Half Moon we pride ourselves in making great tasting, fresh beer using the finest traditional ingredients. Our beer is hand crafted in our state of the art 3.5 barrel all grain brewery. We use the choicest 2-row malted barley and wheat, domestic and imported hops, as well as select strains of brewer’s yeast. There are no preservatives or artificial ingredients added.

name: Westfax Brewing Company
description: The mission of WestFax Brewing Company is to artfully craft quality brews that everyone can enjoy. Whether the beer meets a style guideline or not the beer will be of the highest quality, and most importantly taste delicious. WestFax Brewing Company is a craft brewery located in the beercentric Denver metro area. More specifically on the infamous wickedest street in America, Colfax Avenue; and right next to the similarly infamous Casa Bonita. The brewery is part of renaissance of the West Colfax corridor. Alex Stansbury is the head brewer and is operating on a 7BBL brew house built by Bennett Forgeworks in Ridgway, CO. Alex brings his 15 years of brewing experience to the table and his expertise shows in the quality and craftsmanship of the beers. The dream was formed by Anthony Martuscello, a western NY native who moved to Colorado in 2010. Anthony’s love of craft beer formed during his post college years and only grew after he moved to Colorado. Anthony brings his many years of operations management and process controls experience to the brewery.

name: Cricket Hill Brewing Company
description: We believe that New Jersey is starting to learn what the rest of the country already knows; that local microbrews are some of the best beers in the world! Finally, curious beer drinkers are stepping out from under the mind-numbing barrage of large brewery advertising and deciding for themselves what they like. Our beers are designed for those curious drinkers. The large breweries use fillers in their beer; Corn or Rice are the most frequently used. Most good beer should be all Barley, in the same way that good hamburgers are all beef. Barley is expensive and the more fillers that are used, the better the profits! Cricket Hill Beers are 100% Barley as are most great beers. Please take the time to taste different local beers. I am certain that those who decide not to let television dictate what they drink are ready for a wonderful adventure into the world of Beer!

name: Blue Ridge Brewing Company
description: Blue Ridge Brewing Co. is an established restaurant and brewery, offering 15 years of experience brewing only the finest of home brews and cooking an extraordinary array of unique dishes. Please, stop on by! Born in the foothills of the Blue Ridge Mountains, Greenville's Brew-Pub continues to pay homage to one simple creed, to provide our customers the very best we can! We're as proud of Chef Rich's House-Made Menu as we are of Jay's Freshly Crafted Brews!

name: Free Range Brewing
description: Free Range Brewing, a brewpub currently in its final planning stage, will blend farmhouse tradition, modern sustainability and an industrial flair to create an experience unlike any other in Charlotte. With a passion for creating curiously good beers, Free Range will offer artisan brews that pair harmoniously with its farm-to-table dishes. Free Range will offer an intimate and intriguing dining space that merges with the brewery itself for a uniquely urban-farmstead feel. Beer-lovers will also be able to enjoy Free Range draughts at select area bottle-shops, bars and beer-centric establishments. The brewpub will take advantage of both the culinary and cultural resources from the region to create a product and experience that is distinctly homegrown.

name: Snowbank Brewing
description: A departure from the traditional, Snowbank Brewing focuses on innovation and a passion for the Colorado lifestyle.

name: Revolution Brewing Co
description: At Revolution Brewing, our beer is made by humans for humans using only the finest grains, hops and water. It has not been pasteurized, centrifuged or filtered. There are no chemical additives or artificial ingredients. We craft brew this beer just for you.

name: Carver Brewing Company
description: Operating as a brewery since 1988, we are Colorado's 2nd oldest brew pub. We maintain a tap list of 11 house made beers, produce over 20 different beer styles per year and specialize in recreating traditional lager beer styles and hop-centric American-Style ales. Our restaurant offers American fare with an International influence, focusing on healthy, made-from-scratch items that incorporate locally sourced ingredients. We serve breakfast, lunch and dinner seven days a week, 363 days a year.

name: Ice Harbor Brewing Co
description: Established in 1997, Ice Harbor Brewing Company is dedicated to producing award-winning beers for people who love beer.

name: Brouwerij 't IJ
description: All Brouwerij ’t IJ’s beer is brewed at Funenkade 7 in Amsterdam - all 300,000 litres of it. The Natte, Zatte, Columbus and Struis are 100% organic. A lot of beer never makes it out of the brewery, because it is sold in their pub. What does leave the brewery finds its way to health food shops all over the Netherlands, off licence chains such as Gall&Gall and Mitra, or cafés, mainly in Amsterdam. All the brewery’s beers are top fermented and brewed with traditional craftsmanship.

name: Minglewood Brewery
description: Occupying a building built in 1891, Minglewood Brewery is a brewpub intensely focused on brewing quality craft beer.

name: Grateful Hands Brewing
description: Grateful Hands Brewing produces small (20 gallon) batches of dark ales, focusing on quality not quantity. We are not a large company and have no desire to become a large company. We desire to stay small, local, and dependable. We always want to keep the creativity and fun involved in making and taking care of our beer so that it is always as enjoyable for you to drink it! We are Grateful to be able to share our beer with you. Cheers!

name: Upstate Brewing Company
description: Upstate Brewing Company is a production craft brewery in the Southern Tier (Finger Lakes Region) of New York state. We are open Thurs/Fri/Sat 12-6 & you can watch our brew team in action those days. Our beers are currently on tap at restaurants and bars throughout New York State.

name: Great Raft Brewing Company
description: Great Raft Brewing is a Shreveport, Louisiana based craft brewery dedicated to making creative, authentic beer and helping to build a great beer culture within communities it serves. Co-founders Andrew and Lindsay Nations are Shreveport natives with a passion for beer. Born from their desire to bring exciting, flavorful, fresh craft beer to their hometown, Great Raft Brewing is bringing the craft brewing tradition to Northern Louisiana. Great Raft Brewing was founded on the principle of brewing what we call “Real Beer.” Real Beer is brewed with creativity, passion, and authenticity. Our beer is brewed with creativity that pushes the boundaries of style, a passion for greatness, and authentic, quality ingredients. Drink Real Beer. You deserve it.

name: Free Will Brewing Company
description: We are a production brewery located in bucks county PA. Look for our beer on tap at finer bars and restaurants throughout eastern and central PA. We strive to create unique and delicious beer using traditional ingredients.

name: Community Beer Company
description: BEER FOR THE GREATER GOOD..... Community Beer Company represents many meanings -- all centered on what we feel a great Community represents. FIRST: Beer is Communal. For ages, it’s been a central part of get-togethers among friends, family, and co-workers to celebrate old acquaintances ... or make new ones. SECOND: As a brewery, we are passionate about providing quality craft beer to the people within our Community: Dallas, Texas and the surrounding Metroplex. THIRD: We want to be stewards of our Community by adhering to environmentally sustainable business practices, production, and distribution. And FINALLY: We plan to become an integral part of our Community by giving back to it through charitable activities and supporting our local artists. Truly, Beer for the Greater Good!

name: Thirsty Nomad Brewing Co.
description: Thirsty Nomad Brewing is one of Charlotte's newest nano breweries. Our taproom is cozy, stylish, and laid back - when you walk in our door, you're in a different world. Our beers are uncompromising and diverse. We change our tap list to capture the essence of Charlotte's moods and the whims of our brewers. We have games for adults and kids alike from Zombie Dice to Fluxx. Our patio is a tranquil place to sip a Saison, Pale Ale, Chocolate Stout, or any of the 10 beers we have on tap. We also carry a small selection of wine and soda when you're looking for something different, and plenty of snacks when you're feeling peckish. If you're looking for that place to come as you are, relax, and enjoy a hand crafted beer, Thirsty Nomad Brewing is your new home.

name: Service Brewing Company
description: We are a veteran owned and operated craft brewery, in Savannah Georgia, dedicated to honoring those that have put their lives at risk and their country and community first. We will donate a portion of our revenues to assist charities that support service. Our dedication to this cause is unique and our approach to craft beer is equally unique. While brewing our year round beers on a large scale we maintain a small batch Research and Development division to enable experimentation and innovation using locally available ingredients to connect our farmers and consumers with our beer and our mission.

name: Trillium Brewing
description: We are a family owned and operated brewery in the Fort Point Channel neighborhood of Boston, Massachusetts. We created Trillium to realize our dream of bringing creative and flavorful beers to you. These beers are what we envision might have been made today, if a centuries old beer culture had naturally evolved in New England. To achieve this vision, we stand our craft beers on the shoulders of native ingredients and artisan practices, balancing them with modern-day expertise.

name: Old Rail Brewing Co.
description: Old Mandeville's 1st & only locally owned Brew Pub. Located across the street from the Mandeville Trail-head and adjacent to the St. Tammany Trace.

name: Renegade Brewing Company
description: Offensively Delicious? Yes, that’s what our beer is. Always creative and always packed with flavor. This is beer for those who do the don’ts and don’t the dos, the Renegades. We don’t care about traditional styles, or following the trends, we care about making f’ing delicious beer that we are proud to serve. Renegade was founded by Brian and Khara O’Connell in the summer of 2011 in the Santa Fe Arts District of Denver. Brian brought his offensively delicious brews, developed in his backyard, to Denverites to encourage social interaction and friendship. Come down to our taproom, or ask for us at your favorite bar, restaurant or liquor store. Whatever you do, don’t be something you’re not.Be Renegade.

name: Backlash Beer Company
description: It’s time to stand up against the predictable, old beer establishment and craft beers the way they were intended: flavorful, gimmick free and not produced in ridiculous quantities. We’re a Boston company with a Boston attitude, here to reclaim beer by recruiting people to fuel the craft beer movement. Join the Backlash.

name: GearTooth AleWerks
description: GearTooth AleWerks is a contract brewery operating in San Jose, California. Our name not only pays homage to the owner's German heritage, but also represents a respite from the sterile technology of today, a harkening back to crafting something amazing, and delicious with hard work, sweat, and tears. Our flagship beer is our award winning Conveyor IPA.

name: Oak Hills Brewing Co.
description: We're a production craft brewery in Oak Hills, CA. We focus on creating solid adaptions of classic beer styles for both people new to craft beer, and for people who already know and love great beer! As we grow, we aim to experiment more, creating new, different, & crazier beers for everyone's fun and enjoyment. We have a tasting room up front where you can come in, try tasters & pints, and buy growlers (re-fillable jugs of beer).

name: Sideswipe Brewing
description: Sideswipe Brewing is a nano brewery in Columbus, Ohio. They are known for their palate-punching beers. Taproom Hours Thursday 5pm-9pm Friday & Saturday 5pm-10pm

name: Utepils Brewing Co
description: Good brewing starts with honoring the traditions of brewers who have gone before us. Our beer is brewed using the highest quality water from the historic Glenwood Inglewood wells to produce beer that is classic yet uniquely distinct. Using tried and true brewing practices, we seek to create a new tradition in the Twin Cities that brings friends and families together to share time and beer with one another.

name: Zipline Brewing Co.
description: Proudly headquartered in Lincoln, Nebraska, Zipline Brewing Company was borne out of our passion for locally produced craft beer. Visit this page and our website at www.ziplinebrewing.com to learn more about our company and the beers we produce. You can also follow us on Twitter and Untappd. Cheers!

name: Carolina Brewery
description: Carolina Brewery is a locally-owned brewery and restaurant that has drawn international attention for its handcrafted beers, Our award-winning signature beers include Flagship IPA (Gold Medal, Great American Beer Festival), Copperline Amber Ale (Gold Medal, World Beer Championships), Sky Blue Golden Ale (Silver Medal, World Beer Championships), and Oatmeal Porter. We also offer a rotating list of seasonal brews. Our beers are now available on tap and in growlers and cans throughout North Carolina, so ask for them by name at your favorite bar, restaurant, or grocery store! At our brewpubs in Chapel Hill and Pittsboro NC, you’ll discover authentic tastes in the glass and on the plate, a casual yet upscale atmosphere and affordable prices. Whether you’re looking for a place to grab a fresh beer with friends, enjoy a delicious meal, or host your next party, you’ve come to the right place. Carolina Brewery has been voted Best Brewpub in the Southeast by Brewpub magazine, and Best Burger in the Triangle by Independent Magazine and the readers of The Daily Tar Heel. But above all, we value the opinions of our customers, who cast their vote every time they return to our restaurant. We hope to see you soon. Cheers! Proudly owned and operated by UNC alumni!

name: A l'abri de la Tempête
description: Located in the Îles de la Madeleine , L'Etang-du-Nord in a former fish processing plant, the microbrewery A l'abri de la Tempête (Shelter From The Storm) enjoys a prime location on the seafront, with breathtaking views to the west. Before you go to relax on the beach or after a busy day of sand and salt water, take a refreshing break in our tasting room. A l'abri de la Tempête promotes the use of local raw materials in the design of their beers. That began with the transformation of barley malt, it continues its momentum with the harvest of flowers, seaweed and fresh herbs. The use of local resources is a guarantee of authenticity and freshness that contributes to the design of unique beers and sleek.

name: Palm Breweries
description: Brouwerij Palm is the brewery of the top-fermented beers from Brabant; in the rural settings of Steenhuffel between Antwerp and Brussels. The duchy of Brabant has a tradition of using all the best ingredients nature has to offer. The Brabant draught horse once was Belgium's most important export product. To emphasise how proud they are of their region of Brabant, Brouwerij Palm uses the Brabant draught horse as a logo for its top-fermented beer Special Palm.

name: Oakshire Brewing Company
description: The name Oakshire represents Strength, Independence, Community, values held by our owners and employees. Begun in October 2006 by brothers Jeff and Chris Althouse, Oakshire Brewing operates as a production brewery in the Bethel neighborhood in Northwest Eugene. We make three year round beers, available in 22oz bottles and 12 oz cans and on draft found throughout Oregon, Washington, Idaho, and Alaska. Oakshire makes a rotating seasonal beer available in 22oz bottles and on draft as well. And the brewers at Oakshire craft a range of beers in their Single Batch Beers Series only available on draft.

name: Grupo Modelo S.A. de C.V.
description: Grupo Modelo, founded in 1925, is the leader in Mexico in beer production, distribution and marketing, with 63.0% of the total (domestic and export) market share, as of December 31, 2008. It has seven brewing plants in Mexico, with a total annual installed capacity of 60 million hectoliters. It is the importer of Anheuser-Busch InBev’s products in Mexico, including Budweiser, Bud Light and O’Doul’s. It also imports the Chinese Tsingtao brand and the Danish beer Carlsberg. Through a partnership with Nestlé Waters, it produces and distributes in Mexico the bottled water brands Sta. María and Nestlé Pureza Vital, among others.

name: Red Hare Brewing Company
description: Red Hare Brewing Company is an independent microbrewery located in the heart of Marietta, GA. In August 2011, Red Hare started selling craft beer throughout the state of Georgia and in 2012 became the first craft brewery in Georgia to can their beer. Red Hare Brewing Company was named FOURTH best brewery in the 2016 U.S. Open Beer Championship, accepting FIVE medals! Red Hare offers five year round beers, in addition to seasonal and craft soda brands, and is currently distributed in Georgia, Tennessee,South Carolina, North Carolina, Alabama, and the Florida Panhandle.

name: Burnside Brewing Co
description: Burnside Brewing Co is a production brewery & pub located in the central East side of Portland. Founded in 2010 Burnside is a creation of years of experience in the fermented beverage arts. Look for Burnside Brews to be available around Portland in early 2011 at your favorite beerstablishment or at our rustic pub. We're bringing Brewing back to Burnside!

name: Rhinegeist
description: Rhinegeist is a brewery out of Cincinnati, OH that was built within the skeleton of the old Moerlein bottling plant (built in 1895). Within these unique and historic walls, we brew 20bbl batches of beer that sings with flavor and delights us. The yin/yang of our brewing philosophy is hoppy/sessionable and we aim to brew beers where “the first sip calls for the third”. We’re a small team with big dreams and tend to smile while we sweat. We brew those styles which are most compelling to our thirst and we certainly hope you enjoy our brews as much as we do. Rhinegeist means “ghost of the Rhine”, and refers to our place here in the historic Brewery District in the Over the Rhine neighborhood of Cincinnati. At the turn of the century, this neighborhood was home to nearly 45,o00 inhabitants, most of them of German descent and 38 breweries. We hope to engender the spirit of camaraderie and hard work that we imagine those living and brewing in this neighborhood at that time embodied. We self distribute our beer, which means each beer that you drink in a bar or restaurant is poured from a keg that we delivered cold in our refrigerated van (keep your eyes peeled for it around town). We like to keep beer as fresh as possible, which means that every keg we fill is immediately moved into cold storage where it sits until we load it onto our refrigerated van for delivery to the coldbox of each local account. Fresh beer is tasty beer, and that’s our favorite kind.

name: Cismontane Brewing
description: Cismontane Brewing Co. was started by two native southern Californians, Ross Stewart and Evan Weinberg. They chose the name Cismontane because the geographical area it represents, coastal Southern California from Santa Barbara to San Diego. As a brewery we are dedicated to creating the finest beers to represent the unique culture and diverse natural aspects of this region. Each beer is named after a local feature that is unique to the area. The Brewery is located on the side of the largest mountain in Orange County in the city of Rancho Santa Margarita. The great views from Santiago peak and the trails through the canyons provide some of the natural inspiration for the beers and the company. The brewery is small and accessible to all with a warm and comfortable tasting area. So don’t hesitate to come by when in the area. (cis-mon-tane) “This side of the mountains”, in reference to coastal Southern California. This was a common term used for Southern California while it was forming its identity during the gold rush and before prohibition.

name: Blind Tiger Brewery & Restaurant
description: We opened the first brewery in Topeka since the Prohibition era. It is named after the Prohibition era custom of displaying stuffed tigers in establishments to alert patrons of the availability of bootleg alcohol. These speakeasies were referred to as “Blind Tigers.” We keep at least six flagships and seven rotating seasonals on tap, to the tune of about 1300 barrels a year. Our brews have gathered 21 national and international awards over the past 15 years. Our Brewpub is located at 37th & South Kansas Avenue.

name: Municipal Brew Works
description: A brewery and tap room in Hamilton, Ohio. MBW has taken over the fire department section of Hamilton's former Municipal Building. This building began construction in 1933 and served as the center for city business until the early 1990s. The building sat dormant for over 20 year until MBW brought new life to her old bones. A huge patio, with rotating food trucks create a family (and dog) friendly relaxed environment.

name: Mountain Town Station Brew Pub
description: Mountain Town Station proudly serves central Michigan the highest quality hand crafted brews made from specially selected hops and organic grains. With seven distinctive beers available including seasonal specialty draughts, the brewery is an essential stop on the road to Mount Pleasant. Stop in and try a sampler platter of six beers, one cool pint, or take one of our brews home in a half gallon growler or even a keg of your favorite flavor. Mountain Town Station, central Michigan's premiere brewery and steakhouse.

name: 3 Beards Beer Company
description: 3 Beards Beer Company enables undiscovered artisan brews from all over the world to be locally brewed and freshly distributed. We focus on talented individuals who have the desire, but not necessarily the means, to share their creations with other enthusiasts.

name: 75th Street Brewery
description: 75th Street Brewery is Kansas City’s first and best brewpub that opened its doors in 1993. Located in the historic Waldo district, the Brewery is home to live, local music (including Kansas City’s own Brew Jam every Sunday, and live Bluegrass music every Wednesday). The Brewery boasts award-winning hand-crafted beers (fresh growlers to go every day) and a made-from-scratch menu. 75th Street Brewery has received local, regional, and national awards and accolades, including the 1999 Gold Medal at the World Beer Cup for the Red-Eye Rye Beer. 75th Street Brewery features beers brewed from the great traditions of England, Germany, Ireland, and Czechoslovakia. We also offer special seasonal styles with influences from around the globe. Each of our beers is produced from the finest barley and hops in the world and includes only four basic ingredients: Barley, Hops, Yeast, and Water. No additives or preservatives are used. Because our beers are handcrafted in small batches and kept cold, no preservatives or pasteurization are required. You are guaranteed a fresh and natural pint of beer every time. Cheers!

name: Snipes Mountain Microbrewery & Restaurant
description: Walk between six tall lodge poles that flank the entrance of Snipes Mountain Brewery & Restaurant, push open the big double doors, and come on in. A unique pub and dining experience is waiting for you. Find a seat at the oak bar, in front of the fireplace, or on the wrap-around patio. Designed to reflect the surrounding countryside, there's plenty of wide open spaces for everyone. Separate banquet rooms are also available and children are always welcome!

name: 903 Brewers
description: 903 Brewers was founded on a simple idea; make great beer for a great community. With that idea in mind Jeremy and Natalie Roberts began building the foundation for 903 Brewers back in 2011. Jeremy Roberts is not only the founder but also the head brewer. He spent years perfecting his recipes and letting the community decide what beers they wanted from their local brewery. He fearlessly concocted hundreds of different beers to see what new flavors he might come up with. Not all were a hit, but that is how you find a gem. Do you have an idea for a beer you’d like to try? Let him know, he just might try it out. 903 Brewers officially opened its doors in June of 2013 and introduced to the world The Chosen One Coconut Ale and Roo’s Red Ale. Since that time they have released many new and exciting beers. Starting fall of 2014 you will be able to find their beers in 22oz bombers.

name: City Brewing Company, LLC
